trans-unit.source: Represents a clause in a structured exception-handling block.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en sats i en strukturerad undantagshantering block.

trans-unit.source: The ExceptionHandlingClause class provides information about the clauses in a `try`…`catch`…`finally`
trans-unit.target: Klassen ExceptionHandlingClause innehåller information om satser i en `try`... `catch`…`finally`

trans-unit.source: To get a list of exception-handling clauses in a method, obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> that represents the method.
trans-unit.target: Om du vill hämta en lista över undantagshantering satser i en metod, hämta en <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>som representerar metoden.</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A> method to obtain a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody> object, and then use the <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A> property to get the list of clauses.
trans-unit.target: Använd den <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A>metod för att hämta en <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody>objektet och sedan använda den <xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A>egenskapen för att hämta listan över satser.</xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody.ExceptionHandlingClauses%2A> </xref:System.Reflection.MethodBody> </xref:System.Reflection.MethodBase.GetMethodBody%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Arbeta med undantagshantering satser kräver goda kunskaper om metadata och Microsoft mellanliggande språk (MSIL) instruktion format.

trans-unit.source: Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set".
trans-unit.target: Information finns i dokumentationen Common Language Infrastructure (CLI), "särskilt Partition II: Metadata Definition och semantik" och "Partition III: CIL instruktion ange".

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentationen finns online. Se [ECMA C# och gemensamma Language Infrastructure standarder](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) på MSDN och [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) på Ecma International-webbplatsen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is invoked by derived classes during the construction of <xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause> objects.
trans-unit.target: Den här konstruktorn anropas av härledda klasser under konstruktion av <xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause>objekt.</xref:System.Reflection.ExceptionHandlingClause>

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of exception handled by this clause.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar typ av undantag som hanteras av den här satsen.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Working with exception-handling clauses requires a thorough understanding of metadata and Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction formats.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE]> Arbeta med undantagshantering satser kräver goda kunskaper om metadata och Microsoft mellanliggande språk (MSIL) instruktion format.

trans-unit.source: Information can be found in the Common Language Infrastructure (CLI) documentation, especially "Partition II: Metadata Definition and Semantics" and "Partition III: CIL Instruction Set".
trans-unit.target: Information finns i dokumentationen Common Language Infrastructure (CLI), "särskilt Partition II: Metadata Definition och semantik" och "Partition III: CIL instruktion ange".

trans-unit.source: The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.
trans-unit.target: Dokumentationen finns online. Se [ECMA C# och gemensamma Language Infrastructure standarder](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) på MSDN och [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) på Ecma International-webbplatsen.
